compliant.section: These statements are important information for you as a user of the Young Fast Web Site.
compliant.legal provisions: User consent and awareness of terms.

compliant.section: Please read them carefully before entering the site.

non_compliant.section: If you disagree with any statement contained here, and do not wish to accept these conditions, please do not visit the Young Fast site.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a clear opt-out mechanism or alternative options for users who do not agree with the terms.
